title: La Hormiga
subtitle: The Ant
meta_desc: Learn ant vocabulary in Spanish with audio pronunciation. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, Spanish insects book, ant Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: La Hormiga
pages.prompt: A realistic ant carrying a leaf piece on the ground, strong and determined, professional macro photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: La hormiga es fuerte.

pages.title: Las hormigas van en fila.
